column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////To that end
column2: I sincerely apologize that the time you were quoted on your to-go order was greater than what you experienced. In our business
column3: we must work on estimates (eg. "How long will it be before my table is ready?"; "How busy do you think you'll be for dinner tonight?"). There's nothing exact about "restaurant science
column4: and myriad factors at any given moment can absolutely destroy our most well-intentioned plans.
